alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Fannin; Gilmer; Lumpkin; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 4:26AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lumpkin, southern Gilmer, western Dawson, Pickens and southeastern Fannin Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 426 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Blaine, or 8 miles northwest of Jasper, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Ellijay, East Ellijay, Talking Rock, Amicalola Falls State Park, Sequoyah Lake, Juno, Fausett Lake, Len Foote Hike Inn, Cartecay, Pisgah, Talmadge, Tate, Stover Creek Shelter, Hinton, McKee, Talona, Marblehill, Springer Mountain Shelter and Black Gap Shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.
